name: PulmEx
storyline: Scrub in, it's time for you to take on the role of a pulmonologist carrying out delicate procedures as you learn real medical knowledge.
summary: Pulm Ex brings to life exciting patient cases that healthcare providers can play to stay sharp in pulmonary medicine. Earn CME credits, encounter once-in-a-lifetime cases, and invite colleagues to play with you in the first professional video game designed for pulmonologists.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Pulm Ex: Video Game for Pulmonologists
